text: Branko Rašović (11 April 1942 – 11 October 2024) was a Montenegrin football defender. He played for the Yugoslavia national football team from 1964 to 1967, making ten appearances. Rašović died on 11 October 2024, at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Montenegrin footballers
title: Branko Rašović
